snippet: The markets were helped by a recovery in the price of oil and earnings from Darden Restaurants and Nike.
abstract: Stocks close up, capping strong week helped by rise in price of oil and earnings from Darden Restaurants and Nike.
lead_paragraph: The markets were helped by a recovery in the price of oil and earnings from Darden Restaurants and Nike.

headline.main: Rising Oil and Solid Earnings Push the Market Higher
